name: Proto-Racer
description:
A small prototype made for Project 2 of the DATT2300 class at York University!

Speed affects how quickly obstacles come towards you!

Grip affects how quickly you can move left and right!

(Other stats have no influence on the game)

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow keys to select options and steer.

X key to select.

Credits:

All Assets made by Gong-Fan (Billy) Bao
